mapper.select: select u.id, u.username, uf.email, uf.sex, uf.qq, uf.city, u.enabled, u.last_login_time, u.last_login_ip from admin_user u left join user_profile uf on uf.user_id = u.id where u.id = ${userId}
select r.id, r.description, ur.id selected from admin_role r left join admin_user__role ur on ur.role_id = r.id and (ur.user_id = #{userId} or ur.user_id is null)

SELECT a.id, a.description, ur.id selected from admin_auth a left join admin_role__auth ra on ra.auth_id = a.id left join admin_role r on ra.role_id = r.id left join admin_user__role ur on ur.role_id = r.id where ur.user_id = #{userId} or ur.user_id is null
